results.name: In Alpha section – PVC window 1,23m x 1,48m: White PVC - Double Glazing
results.description:
The covered products are the 1,23m*1,48m PVC windows made of In Alpha PVC sections with double or triple Glazing (8 or 12mm glass thickness) and double leaf

 "Thermal insulation Uw = 1,3 W/ m2.K for double glazing
Thermal insulation Uw = 1,1 W/ m2.K for triple glazing".

results.description:

 "Thermal insulation Uw = 1,3 W/ m2.K for double glazing
Thermal insulation Uw = 1,0 W/ m2.K for triple glazing".
